title: jungle is unfun now
body:
all i get are laners constantly blaming everything on me
haha got solo killed
blame it on the jungle
got solo killed while overextending?
blame it on the jungle
inted lane?
blame it on the jungle
got ganked once?
blame it on the jungle and say you got camped
also they take your camps because theyre mad at you

replies.body: In both their and your defense, most JGs just afk farm ALL game (I really wish I was joking) but I wanna say you're trying but I dunno, I haven't seen you play. But sounds like you are though.

You're always going to get blamed because you're literally the pinpoint of assisting a lane. Everyone expects you to gank their lane all at the same time because they can't seem to hold their own and when they die because you didn't show up, they blame you. That's on them. Junglers are supposed to gank and secure kills for an ADC/TOP/MID Laner or even themselves but they can't always be relied on for help every single second because you need to kill jungle mobs for experience obv. Just ignore them mate, if you enjoy it without their input on your performance, keep it going.
